lead_paragraph: Joseph Ngwenya scored for the Columbus Crew, which ended a team-record 13-game winless streak with a 1-0 victory over the visiting Red Bulls last night. The Red Bulls have failed to score in their first two Major League Soccer games under their new coach, Bruce Arena.
